author: Domhall Carlin
description: Refreshing and floral with a dry, citrus finish.
name: Krakow Tea
recipeIngredient: 105 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE mint in base of shaker (just to bruise)
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
